snippet.title: Assemble With Care - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
When it all falls apart, how do we put things together again?

From the studio that brought you Monument Valley comes Assemble with Care, only on Apple Arcade.

Find out more at:
assemblegame.com

Developer - ustwo games
Trailer - Studio Something
Illustration - Bruno Mangyoku
Animation - Andrei Staruiala
Music - Thomas Williams
